title: hardware
description: a hardware subsystem part of the infrastructure running the computing task

componentName.description: the type of this subsystem part of your infrastructure, example: cpu, gpu, hdd, sdd...

nbComponent.description: the number of items of this component in your infrastructure

memorySize.description: the size of the memory of the component in Gbytes

manufacturer.description: the name of the manufacturer, example: nvidia

family.description: the family of this component, example: geforce

series.description: the series of this component, example: rtx_4080

share.description: the percentage of the physical equipment used by the task
